creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: woman in a dark dress and large hat sitting slightly forward on park bench; holding a large paper or newspaper on lap; foliage to L and rear of bench
marks:
Signature

in graphite on outsite of mat: Henri  initialed in graphite in left margin: [HS], and op
medium: Etching and aquatint on heavy buff wove
provenance: John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: Le Rendezvous
